post.title: panasonic tx-42s30b - frame rate issue/settings
post.content: hello,wondering if anyone can throw some light on this,,i have just bought the about tv,its lovely,really impressed by the picture on it.apart from one thing,i was watching a 720p film on my vbridge/hissense media player last night and noticed every now and then the framerate seemed to judder.,,the same film does not do this on my old asda lcd 720p tv. have i got something set wrong,,the hisense is set to 1080p/60hz (could try 50hz) as appost to 720p/60hz on the old lcd. the intellegent frame creation - max viewing mode-cinema resolution enhancer-max pixel orbiter-auto all i can see to adjust on it really.thank very much for any help
